name: Anti-spoiler for imageboards
description: Makes spoilers visible on most part of imageborards.
additional_info:
Suported imageboards such as: 4chan.org, krautchan.net, puertochan.org, n0l.ch, 0-chan.ru, iichan.hk, dobrochan.com, sich.co, syn-ch.ru, exachan.com, alphachan.org, 2--ch.ru, 2ch.hk and many others.

Tags: imageboard, imageboards, wakaba, kusaba, tinyboard, spoiler, имиджборд, имиджборды, имиджборда, борда, борды, спойлер.
